person.persName: Simon Rice (Bracken County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Bracken County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Indiana native. Married to Nancy Rice. Father of James Rice, John P. Rice, Rebecca Rice, Marietta Rice, and Emma Rice. Farmer in Bracken County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Bracken County in 1860. Served in the 40th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry (U.S.A.) from July 30, 1863 to February 26, 1864.
